title: !Need to know what this font is! its bugging me!
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303085638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/350-OB-website-panel-3_3984.jpg)

Just wondering if anybody can ID this font.

want use something similar but just don't know where to start.

(the one that starts: Join Ocean...)

Thanks heaps.
author: NZTrent

comments.content: This is custom font name of [Creampuff](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303085638/http:/www.urbanfonts.com/fonts/Creampuff.htm).

It's hard to tell exactly what typeface it is because your sample is so tiny, but it looks like something similar to [Cooper Black Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303085638/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/scangraphic/cooper_black_sh_regular_italic/).

If your looking for beautiful black italic type, I'd look at H&FJ's [Proteus Project](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303085638/http:/www.typography.com/fonts/font_overview.php?productLineID=100019&itemID=200050&cpuCount=)

Analisa
You could look at Eclat as well.

![](http://web.archive.org/web/20130303085638im_/http:/typophile.com/files/hyundai_surfing_logo_5338.jpg)

Thanks guys - yes a small sample but thats all i have.

immm, creampuff maybe.

thats funny as i used that font on a logo i did for hyundai a few years back see above...

just looking for like a rounded hybrid serif that is a little fun i guess.

cooper black italic is cool but a little heavy perhaps.
I find always Curlz MT is very extravagant butnot heavy like Cooper.
